meanings.definition: To lay or place between or among.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys interlaying colorful flowers in her garden.
meanings.sent2: The baker is interlaying chocolate chips in the cookie dough.
meanings.sent3: The artist had a fun time interlaying different shapes in the painting.
meanings.sent4: The storyteller skillfully interlayed humor into the tale.
meanings.sent5: The teacher demonstrated interlaying pieces of fabric to the students.

meanings.sent1: He is interlaying cheese between the burger patties.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter is interlaying insulation between the walls.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried interlaying a surprise ingredient in the dish.
meanings.sent4: The detective interlayed clues throughout the investigation.
meanings.sent5: The tailor is interlaying lace between the fabric layers.

meanings.sent1: The dancers are interlaying ribbons in their performance.
meanings.sent2: The author is interlaying different storylines in the novel.
meanings.sent3: The spider was interlaying its web in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: The musician interlayed melodies to create a beautiful composition.
meanings.sent5: The weaver is interlaying threads to make a patterned fabric.
